credit_line: Museum purchase from General Acquisition Endowment and Decorative Arts Association Acquisition Funds
dimensions: L x W (clasped): 21 x 23 cm (8 1/4 x 9 1/16 in.)
title: Necklace
medium: Hammered steel nails, gold, silver, mother-of-pearl
description: Chainmail form made of silver, covered with overlapping rows of hammered, flattened feather-like steel nails; row of small, gold pod forms along inner edge;  large clasp covered by roughly square panel of pale rose mother-of-pearl with gold fastenings.
name: Necklace
